description: Collects statistical metrics from Couchbase server nodes.

paramSchema.title: Couchbase Username
paramSchema.name: serverUsername
paramSchema.description: The administrative username to access the Couchbase server (default: 'admin').

paramSchema.title: Couchbase Password
paramSchema.name: serverPassword
paramSchema.description: The administrative password to access the Couchbase server (default: '').

paramSchema.title: Poll Retry Count
paramSchema.name: pollRetryCount
paramSchema.description: The number of times to retry failed HTTP requests (default: 5, infinite: 0).

paramSchema.title: Poll Retry Delay
paramSchema.name: pollRetryDelay
paramSchema.description: The interval (in milliseconds) to wait before retrying a failed request (default: 3000).

paramSchema.title: Poll Interval
paramSchema.name: pollInterval
paramSchema.description: How often (in milliseconds) to poll the Couchbase node for metrics (default: 5000).

paramSchema.title: Advanced Metrics
paramSchema.name: advancedMetrics
paramSchema.description: Produce more detailed metrics (more expensive to compile, default: true).
